title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Meet Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses — your big-screen entertainment and gaming hub that fits in your pocket. Slip on 75g of pure wow and step into a 360" Micro-OLED virtual display that’s crisp, vibrant, and unbelievably immersive, whether you’re streaming movies, playing cloud games, or mirroring your devices.

Why you’ll love it:
- Giant 360" Micro-OLED screen: Cinema-scale visuals with rich contrast and sharp detail, anytime, anywhere.
- Android TV 12 built in: Browse, download, and launch apps directly from Google Play.
- Stream what you love: HDCP support unlocks premium services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock without hassle.
- Cloud gaming ready: Pair a controller and jump into your favorite titles with low-latency fluidity.
- Comfort for your eyes: TüV Rheinland Eye Comfort certification helps reduce strain during long sessions.
- Sharp vision without prescriptions: Built-in diopter adjustment from 0.00D to -6.00D—no extra lenses required.
- Plug-and-play flexibility: Connect via USB-C, or use the included HDMI and wireless adapters for Android, iOS, and Windows devices.

From flights to commutes to couch time, Rokid AR Joy Pack transforms any moment into a personal theater or game room. Powerfully simple. Wonderfully portable. Seriously fun.
